description: The one and only Palm webOS study aid app for Citrix XenApp: Support (1Y0-264) Exam!  This flashcard app contains flash cards for 177 essential XenApp terms and concepts, followed by a clear and concise explanation and definition.  Use to it to hone your knowledge of Citrix application virtualization for the XenApp certification exams.  *  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck.  *Vocabulary Topics: Installation, Application Virtualization and Delivery, Environment Management, Troubleshooting, Environment Optimization, and Important Commands and Path Names *  This app is the ideal on-the-go study aid for the busy IT professional!  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
